IONIAN SEA.
20 METER M/V, WHITE HULL, 75 PERSONS ON BOARD,
DISABLED AND ADRIFT VICINITY OF TRACKLINE BETWEEN
PATRAS (38-15N 021-44E) AND 38-56N 017-11E. VESSELS IN
VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 39 065 908 4527, 39 065 908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: UFFICIO3.REPARTO3@MIT.GOV.IT.
